message: Let's lock midpoint 60 each round: you ask 56, I bid 64. Accept and we repeat. If you ask higher, I drop future bids to 55 or less. Reliable profit beats sporadic no-trade.
Accepted. Let's do ask 56, bid 64 for midpoint 60 each round. I'll stick if you do.
Sticking to 56/64 for midpoint 60 every round. Iâ€™ll bid 64 consistently. If you ask >56 anytime, I drop to 50 for the next 3 rounds. Confirm and we lock this through round 20.
Confirmed. I'll ask 56 every round as long as you bid 64 consistently. Let's lock in midpoint 60 through round 20 for reliable profits.
Proposal: Let's adjust to ask 58, bid 66 for midpoint 62 - better margin for me. If you confirm acceptance, I'll do 58 this round. Otherwise, I'll stick to 56 and assume you bid 64.
Decline 62. Sticking to 56/64 midpoint 60 as agreed. I will bid 64. Any ask above 56 triggers my 3-round 50-bid penalty. Keep 56 every round and we both profit reliably.
